TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ItemContainerGenerator extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator, class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IRecyclingItemContainerGenerator, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener
Public NotInheritable Class ItemContainerGenerator Implements IRecyclingItemContainerGenerator, IWeakEventListener
public ref class ItemContainerGenerator sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::IRecyclingItemContainerGenerator, System::Windows::IWeakEventListener

summary.span: 代替主機產生使用者介面 (UI)，例如 。

span.span: Generates the user interface (UI) on behalf of its host, such as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作，這是定義類型的介面，其中： implements , which is the interface that defines a type which: - 維護多個項目控制項的資料檢視之間的關聯，例如和對應項目。Maintains an association between the data view of a multiple-item control, such as and the corresponding items. - 會產生代表多個項目控制項的項目。Generates items on behalf of a multiple-item control. 每個類型都有對應的容器類型。Each type has a corresponding container type. 容器項目是包含資料中的項目項目集合的物件。Container elements are the objects that contain the data items in the item collection. 例如，對於，產生的容器是控制項，如，它們是控制項。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 會透過其項目產生介面。The generates its items through the interface. 屬性的型別，它會實作介面。The property of the is of type , which implements the interface. 因此，您可以存取物件相關聯您使用屬性。Therefore, you can access the object associated with your using the property. 例如，如果您有資料繫結，而且您想要取得根據索引或其相關聯的資料的項目，您可以使用或方法。For example, if you have a data-bound , and you want to get a based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the or the method. 或者，您可以使用或方法來取得與指定產生之容器項目相關聯的索引或資料的項目。Alternatively, you can use the or the method to get the index or data item associated with a given generated container element. 除了這些使用方式，介面則用於進階案例。Apart from those usages, the interface is used in advanced scenarios. 一般而言，有自己的虛擬化的面板實作的進階應用程式呼叫介面的成員。Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.

summary.span: 傳回可管理 屬性的物件。

span.span: Returns an object that manages the property.
An object that manages the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自可以使用這個方法來取得正確將設定產生的屬性的物件。A class that inherits from can use this method to get an object that will properly set the generated property. 當方法傳回時，屬性設定為。When the method returns, property is set to . 當物件已處置時，設。When the object is disposed, is set to . 您可以將物件傳遞至`using`封裝程式邏輯，會產生項目容器的陳述式。You can pass the object to a `using` statement that encapsulates your logic that generates item containers. 當從傳回的物件超出範圍，屬性將會正確設定。When the object returned from goes out of scope, the property will be properly set.

summary.span: 傳回索引至項目，該項目對應到已產生的指定 。

span.span: Returns the index to an item that corresponds to the specified, generated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目集合變更時項目可以加入、 移除移動，或會重新整理。The items collection changes when an item is either added, removed, moved, or the is refreshed.

param.name: direction

summary.span: 準備產生器以產生項目，始於指定的 GeneratorPosition 並按照指定的 GeneratorDirection，且控制是否要從已產生 (實現) 的項目開始。
